thread.title: Karrueche Makes Shocking Allegations in Restraining Order Filed Against Chris Brown
thread.title_full: Karrueche Makes Shocking Allegations in Restraining Order Filed Against Chris Brown

author: Jasmine Grant
title: Karrueche Makes Shocking Allegations in Restraining Order Filed Against Chris Brown
text:
Karrueche Makes Shocking Allegations in Restraining Order Filed Against Chris Brown A death threat was reportedly made. by Jasmine Grant 1h ago 
Chris Brown ’s ex-girlfriend Karrueche Tran has been trying to distance herself from the singer since their split over a year ago, and is now reportedly taking legal measures to do so. The situation has apparently gotten so creepy for the budding actress, she had no choice but to file a restraining order. New court docs filed by her legal team reveal some horrifying details that put the superstar singer under a very bad light. 
According to TMZ , Karrueche claimed in a sworn statement that Chris sent her numerous death threats and refuses to let her move on with her life. Worst yet, the model claims their relationship was abusive and that a few years back, Chris punched her in the stomach twice, and pushed her down the stairs. This is a scary new revelation about the singer, especially considering that at the time, he was still on probation for assaulting Rihanna back in 2009. The “Fine China” singer certainly didn’t help his case by posting an incriminating video on Instagram proudly bragging about his stalker ways. 
Sheesh! This situation between these two gets messier by the minute. 
From Issa Rae to Donald Trump to Kanye and Kim, 2016 was full of many highs and lows.
